[[wikipedia:Role-playing video game|RPG]] elements |}}'''Quest for Mordor''' is a game made by someone who calls himself ''Morgoth''.[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/qfm.html Quest For Mordor] at Tolkien Games (retrieved at 12 August 2010)[http://hobbitstuff.tripod.com/qfm.htm Quest For Mordor] at Beneath the Mountain (retrieved at 12 August 2010) The player finds an [[Rings of Power|Elven Ring]] at an island near [[Mordor]], and has to use it against [[Morgoth]]. It was designed with [[Klik & Play]].[http://tieba.baidu.com/f?kz=177120564 Baidu, 托尔金相关游戏简介] (retrieved 2 May 2011) {{References}} {{title|italics}} [[Category:Action games]]
